participant_1.background:
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I miss the weather in my old hometown, but I'm starting to appreciate the change of seasons here.
i like playing badminton.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

participant_2.background:
I like the color green because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like writing poetry and playing guitar to process my emotions.
Oh, that's really cool! I'm not very creative, so I stick to more solitary activities like reading and writing.
I love to read, too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different genres, but my favorites are usually historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! Have you read any books by Philippa Gregory?
Yes, I love her books! I've read all of the ones set in Tudor England.
Me too! She's one of my favorite authors.
What are some of your favorite fantasy books?
I love the Lord of the Rings series and the Harry Potter series.
Those are both great series! I've read them both multiple times.
Me too! I'm always looking for new fantasy books to read.
Have you read the His Dark Materials trilogy by Philip Pullman?
No, I haven't heard of that one.
It's a really good series. It's about a young girl who goes on an adventure to find her missing father.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's one of my favorite series.
